document.full_text: federal prosecutors are trying to force james risen to testify at a trial about who leaked information to him about a c.i.a. effort to sabotage iran's nuclear program.
document.title: subpoena issued to writer in c.i.a.-iran leak case
lines_and_colors: federal prosecutors are trying to force james risen to testify at a trial about who leaked information to him about a c.i.a. effort to sabotage iran's nuclear program.
